items.text: full, angled in, clipped to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full, angling in, flicked through midwicket
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.preText: nj: "Wondering if this is the same Bangladesh which gave in so meekly during the Test matches ?"
items.text: full, pushed across, driven to mid-on off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: turned away to the on side
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: MahneelMusa: "Loved the send off by Joseph. A little bit of spice in the game never hurts!"
items.text: short, wide, slapped over cover and point. Fastest fifty ever in ODI cricket for Bangladesh
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: short of good length outside off, stabbed to point
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: more width and more runs as he punches this short one away
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.preText: Can spin remedy this leakage of runs? Ashley Nurse to try.
items.text: same result. Short loosener to start off, spins away to give him width and he punches between cover and point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: advances down the ground but it's shorter than he'd have liked and he's forced to smother the spin
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short, rips away past the off-stump from middle and leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pitched up, pats it down the pitch
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: blocked off the outside of the bat as it spins away and he comes forward
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: defended to the right of the bowler off the front foot. Good recovery after the first-ball four
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Mim: "All the Bangladeshi fans who stayed up all night are getting their time worth"
items.text: full, angled across outside off, punched straight down the ground. The run barrage continues... STOP THIS.. SOMEBODY STOP THIS MAAADNESS!
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: that's a little sedate for a change! Length on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: just how many times will I type this tonight? Short, wide, crashed through cover and point. They're finding the gaps like it's a click of a button
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: turned away to deep midwicket for a brace
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: through the gap again. Clipped off the pads behind square leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on the pads, driven towards mid-on
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Sumant Kumar: ""STOP THIS.. SOMEBODY STOP THIS MAAADNESS!" Made me remember Phoebe in Friends." Yup, that was the tone I intended to say it in. Glad you got it. :-)
items.text: short ball, pulled wide of long-on for [checks notes] one run.. Whaaaat!
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: shifts back and punches down to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched  back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: drops short of slip as it turns and shaves the edge and gets past the keeper's leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: turn and bounce as it spins past the outside edge
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: carves a punch to point as it spins away
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run
